Description: Located near the center of Sa Pa town. The highest point is 1850m above sea level.
Nearly 2000m above sea level. Pha Luong is known by many as the Roof of Moc Chau.
The mountain has 3 peaks; when participating you only need to conquer peak 1; it is recommended to conquer peak 2 or 3 (with steeper slopes and more challenging cliffs)
